definition: a rack to hold meat for cooking over hot charcoal usually out of doors, to cook outdoors on a barbecue grill
details:
noun
- a rack to hold meat for cooking over hot charcoal usually out of doors
= synonyms: barbecue
- a cookout in which food is cooked over an open fire
= synonyms: barbecue
- meat that has been barbecued or grilled in a highly seasoned sauce
= synonyms: barbecue
verb
- to cook outdoors on a barbecue grill
= example: to cook outdoors on a barbecue grill
= synonyms: barbecue
